long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Favorites Tab - Simple Favorites Management

Favorites Tab is a designed to help you organize and access your bookmarks and favorites effortlessly. With aã€€simple favorites list, you can keep frequently used sites at your fingertips and seamlessly switch between bookmarks and favorites.

Features:
- Favorites List: Store your favorite sites above your bookmarks for easy, clutter-free access.
- Bookmark Management: View and organize all your bookmarks in one place.
- Automatic Icon Retrieval: Displays site favicons automatically, or uses placeholders for a consistent look.
- Drag-and-Drop Sorting: Reorder your favorites with simple drag-and-drop functionality.
- Dark Theme Support: Compatible with dark mode for a smooth browsing experience.
